# isSelectable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view is selectable.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSelectable: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls the ability of the user to select content and interact with URLs and text attachments. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Working with the selection

- **selectedRange**: The current selection range of the text view.
- **scrollRangeToVisible(_:)**: Scrolls the text view until the text in the specified range is visible.
- **clearsOnInsertion**: A Boolean value that indicates whether inserting text replaces the previous contents.
